public class CustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Customer page for updating and creating new appointments.

    • selectFirstLevelDivision

      Parameters:

    • selectCountry

      public Country selectCountry(FirstLevelDivision division)
      Fetches the Country Object that match the division's countryID.
      Parameters:
      division - the FirstLevelDivision to find Country for
      Returns:
      Country

    • sendCustomer

      public void sendCustomer(Customer customer)
      Sends customer to Customer page. When update button is pressed in AppointmentCustomerPage, the selected customer's information is sent to the customer page to fill each of the fields, and the page is set to "update mode".
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to update

    • onActionCountryComboBox

      void onActionCountryComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      After selecting a country, enables and filters divisionComboBox.
      Parameters:
      event - when user interacts with countryComboBox

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sends user back to AppointmentCustomerPage. If any fields are filled, user is prompted to continue.
      Parameters:
      event - Cancel button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveCustomer

      void onActionSaveCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Create/Update Customer after button is pressed. Afterwords, user is sent to AppointmentCustomerPage. If any values are empty, user is alerted.
      Parameters:
      event - Create/Update Customer Button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes page. Sets the customerIDTextField and prepares comboBoxes.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      resourceBundle -
